issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new default two tab mobile application
2. From Studio select the run option 'Mobile Web Preview in Emulator'
3. Attempt to switch between tab 1 and tab 2

Actual Result:
One is not able to switch between the tabs

Expected result:
One is able to switch between tabs
fields.summary: Mobile Web : Tab Group - When launching a default two tab application to preview in emulator, one cannot switch back and forth between the two tabs
fields.environment:
Tested with Ti Studio build 1.0.8.201201262211
Ti Mob SDK 1.8.1.v20120127173134
OSX Lion

comments.body: Cannot reproduce in emulator for iOS and Android, or on iOS and Android devices. Most likely was fixed by another ticket, but I'm not really sure which one it might be off the top of my head.
